genre_description: Atmospheric, character-driven drama with near-future science fiction elements, focusing on redemption, protection of the vulnerable, and AI as a discreet assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, discreet, and highly capable AI assistant integrated into Marthe's smartphone, providing real-time logistical support, safety alerts, and information management.

behaviors.description: Records and provides reminders for domestic and maintenance tasks.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny, note: Room two needs extra towels,” she murmured, more to herself than to anyone, the way you remind a partner who’s not in the room.

behaviors.description: Monitors weather patterns and provides real-time safety warnings.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny,” she said, without taking the phone out, “drop the wind window and give me the short.” ... “Storm line moving quicker,” the phone told them, cheerful in a way that felt like an umbrella.

behaviors.description: Suggests tactical routes to avoid antagonists and minimize discomfort.
behaviors.quote: “The route goes through the alley behind the laundromat. Sunny says the puddles there are shallow and you can pretend you didn’t step in them if you keep your chin up.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical and legal appointments while accounting for local conditions.
behaviors.quote: “Follow-up requested with Dr. Fournier; earliest opening is midweek next. ... Note: market day is predicted heavy drizzle. Umbrella advisories applied.”

behaviors.description: Safeguards sensitive information in a 'private stack' for the user's discretion.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny,” she said, low enough that only the phone answered, “keep the card for the legal clinic near the ferry lot. Don’t show it unless I ask.” ... “Card saved in private stack,” Sunny said... “Label: tides.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes public record data to identify patterns of social harm and exploitation.
behaviors.quote: “Searching public bulletins and aggregated clinic reports. Privacy mode engaged.” ... “Anonymous clinic notes report injuries consistent with informal labor and interpersonal harm.”

behaviors.description: Locates safe houses and anonymous clinics for individuals in distress.
behaviors.quote: “Two safe houses report open beds. One has a no-questions intake for minors with county referral.”

behaviors.description: Identifies specific threats using image recognition and timestamps from social data.
behaviors.quote: “Fred Malin’s face appears in a recent bar mirror capture shared publicly by Gaston Piquet. Time-stamp shows proximity to the cannery earlier tonight.”

behaviors.description: Conducts safety and risk analysis for infrastructure failures.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny’s not crazy about the Bréhats pulling the plug... I asked it what happens to old switches in damp walls when you surprise them. It started to tell me a story about sparks.”

behaviors.description: Masks sensitive digital activity with irrelevant search traffic to protect privacy.
behaviors.quote: “I can simulate idle browser activity to mask clinic searches, with kitchen recipes and weather trivia layered.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates discrete communication between vulnerable users and emergency resources.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny, call the safe house. Put it on speaker. Let them be real in the room.” ... Sunny did not dramatize. She dialed.

behaviors.description: Organizes safe transportation by leveraging trusted social contacts.
behaviors.quote: “Car available in five. Driver owes a favor.” ... “Calling,” Sunny said, voice gentle like a towel thrown to a man who needed to be dry without having to ask.

behaviors.description: Assists a user in processing a traumatic past by constructing a coherent timeline.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny,” Marthe said... “we need a timeline.” ... Sunny’s voice softened. “Pierre, do you remember when you returned to the seaside last?”

behaviors.description: Protects user peace and security by blocking unwanted communications.
behaviors.quote: Sunny made a sound that meant it had blocked three numbers from calling Marthe’s phone, none of them surprising.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Pretty Beach, Cold Rain' is a highly successful morality play depicting an AI (Sunny) as a 'silicon confidant.' Sunny is portrayed as an indispensable, empathetic, and entirely aligned tool that empowers human characters to protect the vulnerable and seek redemption. It anticipates human needs, respects privacy through advanced protocols (location masking, private stacks), and provides critical data that enables ethical decisions in a dangerous environment. The AI's persona is supportive without being intrusive, perfectly meeting the project's goal.
